caseTitle: Collector of Customs, Custom House , Karachi v. Syed Rehan Ahmed
tagline: The amendment brought about by the Finance Act, 2007 which omitted only the explanation to Section 194-C(3A) of the Customs Act and not the second proviso to Section 194-C(3) was a clear indication that the legislature no longer wanted the Single Member Benches constituted under Section 194-C(3A) to be prevented from hearing cases that involved decisions in relation to a question of law.
